<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return whether the person is hidden (reached the hiding position). For command that tests general visibility of an object use [[isObjectHidden]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isHidden''' person

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_bobIsHidden = [[isHidden]] bob;</code>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isObjectHidden]], [[getHideFrom]], [[setHideBehind]], [[findCover]]
</value></part></template>
